!Master Gobie: Speak up! Captain Bathis must have treated you with contempt, eh ? A good lession fro you, is that not all the races in this Outer World see us the same way. Some respect us as equals, others see us simply as sword fodder in battle. Even individuals within a race treat us differently... As newcomers to the mainland, we dare not risk offending any of these reces now. In fact, our orders are to provide assistance to each of them impartially. So, we must learn to govern our tempers... [Quest _063_PathToWarder master_gobie_q0063_08.htm|"I see."]
